translations: n．一口（食物或饮料）：指一次能放进嘴里的食物或饮料的量。
· She took small mouthfuls of the soup.
她一小口一小口地喝着汤。

sentences.sentence: I managed to cram down a few mouthfuls of food.
sentences.translation: 我好歹狼吞虎咽地吃了几口东西。

sentences.sentence: I was too hot and tired to eat more than a few mouthfuls.
sentences.translation: 我又热又累，只能吃下几口。

sentences.sentence: When dinning, keep your eyes on your date at all times and try to smile between mouthfuls.
sentences.translation: 吃饭的时候，要时刻关注你的约会对象，试着在吃饭的间隙微笑。
